game.name: Pro Gym
game.description:
You have gained extra weight that actually does not suit your look! So, you have decided to burn those extra excessive calories accumulated around your belly. The problem is that this also makes you feel dizzy and nausea. No need to give up! Every problem has a solution. All you need to focus on some important workout tips and you will be amazed to see the result in the mirror in this performing game for boys and girls. Burn all your fat by putting hard efforts.

Start this exclusively-designed free online sport with choosing a character between a girl and a boy. Once it is done, choose a workout machine and help your character to make some sweats out. Make sure that you keep your eyes on the speed/count bar in order to accomplish each task perfectly. Do not forget to purchase some food for your character if you see decreasing the food bar. Let your character have a proper sleep if the sleep bar decreases. 

Hope you will have fun unlimited in this awesome Pro Gym simulator game for boys! This chosen chubby character will definitely give you big thanks if you help him to get into the perfect workout routine. The job is pretty difficult, but these two chubby characters know very well that you have the guts to help them get back into a nice shape. The completion of missions is essential to level up and allow you to unlock some more new and useful equipment. Take proper food and rest to follow a perfect workout regime! Buy some healthy meals for your character using the coins so that your character gets the energy to keep going on the next day. Good luck kids to play this cool sport!
